name: tentree Retro Tentree Tank - Women's
description:
An easy tank that's ready for all of your hot weather adventures.Soft Treeblend fabric is made of recycled and natural fibres, giving you a clean conscience.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Regular fit feels just right.
